001
002package com.commercetools.api.predicates.query;
003
004public interface EqualityPredicateBuilder<T, TValue> extends ComparablePredicateBuilder<T, TValue> {
005
006    /**
007     * creates predicate to a field has the specified value
008     * @param value value to be checked for equality
009     * @return a combination predicate
010     */
011    default CombinationQueryPredicate<T> is(final TValue value) {
012        return is(PredicateOperator.IS_EQUAL, value);
013    }
014
015    /**
016     * creates predicate to a field has the value of the supplied variable
017     * @param variable variable name
018     * @return a combination predicate
019     */
020    default CombinationQueryPredicate<T> isVar(final String variable) {
021        return is(PredicateOperator.IS_EQUAL, VariableQueryPredicate.of().constant(variable));
022    }
023}
